title: Montessori Teaching - Fundamental Concepts & Principles
headline: In this free online course, learn about the concepts of Montessori Teaching as the basis for early years education.
description: This course on Montessori teaching covers the fundamental concepts and historical context of early childhood education (ECE), Maria Montessori and her observations about the learning behaviours of children, and different established domains of Montessori. It also explains the role of the surroundings for environment-led learning. This course is an ideal match for beginners in the Montessori method.

courseDescription:
Globally, Montessori teachers are in high demand. In many countries the vacancies for Montessori teachers remain open because there are not enough professionals to fill them. This free online course is the first substantial step towards becoming a Montessori teacher. It will help build your interest in Montessori teaching in just a short span of time as it focuses on Montessori principles and the observations of Maria Montessori (the pioneer of Montessori teaching). Within a Montessori-empowered environment, the child will enjoy self-construction and eventually have the freedom to learn on their own within a structured setting. This course will also highlight the fundamental areas of Montessori teaching. 

It does not go into the details of each activity and exercise in the Montessori method but rather provides you with an overview of this approach to teaching as a whole. It is an ‘awareness’ course for professionals who are looking to make a career In Montessori teaching. It will explain the fundamental learning behaviours of children, give you Maria Montessori’s background, and look at other early childhood education approaches with a historical context. As a Montessori teacher, you need to be highly creative, intelligent and compassionate as you are committed to enhancing the lives of your pupils.

This free online course comes with study reminders and transferable notes that can be taken throughout. It is ideal for those who are looking to make a career in Montessori teaching. This course can also be used by parents who are looking to create a similar environment for Montessori teaching at home. Enrolling for this course will allow you to expand your knowledge and skills in the Montessori method.
